summary: Passionate sustainability change agent with a demonstrated history of working in the Financial sector. Skilled in Sustainable Business Development, Corporate Social Responsibility, Project Management, Environmental Awareness, and Risk Management including Environmental and Social Risks. Sustainability strategist professional with a Master's degree focused in Environmental and Energy Management from University of Twente.

• Implemented CIB’s internal Social & Environmental Management System based on Equator Principles.

• Acted as the bank’s focal point with United Nations Environment Program Finance Initiative (UNEP FI).

• Coordinated between the Egyptian Banking Federation, UNEP FI, CIB and other banks to develop a framework for Social & Environment due diligence in Egyptian banks.
• Developed and monitored the bank’s Social & Environmental Key Performance Indicators and integrate them in CIB’s Enterprise Risk Management System.
• Assessed the Social & Environmental impacts for projects financed by CIB and design an Action Plan when needed.
